page.title: 04Michelle a girl in Ponteland
page.content: I am a girl of nine years old and I live in Ponteland in the county of Northumberland which is part of North East England.I have one sister who is younger than me.On a Saturday I often get up early and go in the wagon which my father drives.He sometimes carries livestock and at other times he delivers parcels and boxes.We quite often travel a long way from home to places like Alnwick,30 miles or Berwick,60 miles away.Both these towns are North of us.When I go with my father I get up at 5 o'clock and for my breakfast I have cereal and a glass of milk.My father and mother have fried bacon and egg with a drink of tea or coffee.I wear a T-shirt which is made of cotton and has printing on it,instead of a skirt I wear blue denim jeans.My socks are bright colours with shoes called trainers.
